metadata.description: Comprehensive knowledge cache of the Astra Intelligence system architecture.

astra_modules.agents: Implements Astra multi-agent system (MomentumAgent, RiskAgent, etc.)
astra_modules.chart_core: Chart rendering and visualization components for dashboards.
astra_modules.core: Main system logic including AstraPrime and feature builders.

engine.ranking_engine.py: Ranks agent outputs to produce unified intelligence signals.
engine.scan_manager.py: Manages scans across markets and agent subsystems.
engine.state_bundle_builder.py: Builds and maintains unified state bundles for Astra runtime.

fetch_core.fetch_crypto.py: Fetches cryptocurrency data from multiple sources.
fetch_core.fetch_unified.py: Unified interface for fetching data across asset types.

guardian.guardian_v6.py: Primary system protection and verification engine.
guardian.auto_repair.py: Automated recovery for damaged modules or data.

learning.learning_engine.py: Handles all neural training and inference processes.
learning.replay_buffer.py: Experience replay system for reinforcement-style training.
learning.paper_trader.py: Simulated trading module for backtesting strategies.

astra_modules.scanners: Implements market and technical scanners for agent data input.

state.state_bundle_builder.py: Constructs internal state representations for agents.

astra_modules.system: Handles runtime configuration, system paths, and base controls.
astra_modules.tabs: Supplementary UI monitoring and analytics tabs.

ui.tab_system.py: System health and environment monitoring tab.

astra_modules.universe: Defines and manages Astra’s universe of assets and symbols.

utils.memory_engine.py: Manages persistent and volatile memory across the system.
utils.safe_api_wrapper.py: Wraps external API calls safely with rate limiting and retries.
utils.safe_df.py: Ensures DataFrame operations are robust and consistent.
utils.error_handler.py: Centralized error logging and handling utilities.

astra_modules.universe_legacy.py: Legacy universe builder for backward compatibility.
